## Description {#details}

The <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/btf">BTF</a> common type definition.

Different kinds may have additional information after this structure data.

Definition at line 107 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/btf/btf-h">BTF.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Member Attributes

###  {#a3d85767c4caccaca0ffdb5da441756e5}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="union llvm::BTF::CommonType llvm::BTF::CommonType">
&quot;Size&quot; is used by INT, ENUM, STRUCT and UNION.

&quot;Size&quot; tells the size of the type it is describing.

&quot;Type&quot; is used by PTR, TYPEDEF, VOLATILE, CONST, RESTRICT, FUNC, FUNC&#95;PROTO, VAR, DECL&#95;TAG and TYPE&#95;TAG. &quot;Type&quot; is a type&#95;id referring to another type.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/btf/btf-h/#l00129">129</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/btf/btf-h">BTF.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### Info {#ac7b8a277835d20720f8bb1cf3397c241}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint32&#95;t llvm::BTF::CommonType::Info</>}>
&quot;Info&quot; bits arrangement: Bits 0-15: vlen (e.g.

# of struct&#39;s members) Bits 16-23: unused Bits 24-28: kind (e.g. int, ptr, array...etc) Bits 29-30: unused Bit 31: kind&#95;flag, currently used by struct, union and fwd

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/btf/btf-h/#l00118">118</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/btf/btf-h">BTF.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
